00017 #include <string>
00018 #include "PhysicsTools/LiteAnalysis/interface/FunctionMember.h"

00021 template <typename T>
00022 class Method : public FunctionMember
00023 {
00024 public:
00026   Method() {}
00027     
00029   Method(std::string methodexpression)
00030     : FunctionMember(boost::python::type_id<T>().name(), methodexpression),
00031       methodexpression_(methodexpression) {}
00032 
00033   virtual ~Method() {}
00034 
00035   std::string name() const
00036   {
00037     return std::string(boost::python::type_id<T>().name()) 
00038       + std::string("::") + methodexpression_;
00039   }
00040 
00041   double operator()(const T& object)
00042   {
00043     void* address = (void*)(&object);
00044     void* raddr = invoke(address);
00045     if ( raddr == 0 ) 
00046       return 0;
00047     else
00048       return *static_cast<double*>(raddr); 
00049   }
00050 
00051   double operator()(T& object)
00052   {
00053     void* address = (void*)(&object);
00054     void* raddr = invoke(address);
00055     if ( raddr == 0 ) 
00056       return 0;
00057     else
00058       return *static_cast<double*>(raddr); 
00059   }
00060 private:
00061   std::string methodexpression_;
00062 };
